items.title: The stock market usually doesn't care about government shutdowns. This time may not follow the script
items.description: The current funding dispute is raising concern among investors and strategists, who say the economic backdrop now is the weakest since 1990.

items.title: Warren Buffett is reportedly eyeing Berkshire Hathaway's biggest deal in three years
items.description: The potential deal, which could finalize within days per the Journal, could be Berkshire's largest since 2022 when it bought Alleghany for $11.6 billi...

items.title: The stars are aligning for this delivery stock to burst to all-time highs, according to the charts
items.description: Todd Gordon walks through the charts on this food delivery giant.

items.title: Warren Buffett's Japan bet that he discovered by reading a 'little handbook' is up as much as sixfold
items.description: "We expect Berkshire Hathaway to continue to build up stakes in the sector's big five companies at a moderate pace for the time being," JPMorgan said.

items.title: Worried about the AI trade faltering? Look at these stocks, Trivariate says
items.description: Trivariate Research is recommending investors concerned about a potential AI bubble add these stocks to their portfolios.
